com.facebook.litho.sections

Class Section.Builder<T extends Section.Builder<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.sections.Section.Builder<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataDiffSection.Builder, HideableDataDiffSection.Builder, SingleComponentSection.Builder, ViewPagerHelperSection.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    Section

    public abstract static class Section.Builder<T extends Section.Builder<T>>
extends Object
    A builder to build a Section with a SectionLifecycle L. Generated lifecycle classes will expose a create() method to access a builder and will add methods to the builder to set all the props defined in the GroupSectionSpec/ DiffSectionSpec. By default the builder exposes a method that the parent can use to specify an key for its children. The key should be set every time a parent might have more children with the same SectionLifecycle.

      • checkArgs

        protected static void checkArgs(int requiredPropsCount,
                                BitSet required,
                                String[] requiredPropsNames)
        Checks that all the required props are supplied, and if not throws a useful exception
        Parameters:
        requiredPropsCount - expected number of props
        required - the bit set that identifies which props have been supplied
        requiredPropsNames - the names of all props used for a useful error message
